summary: REQ-16 appears implemented in SiteFooter by replacing social icons/links with TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook and including aria-labels plus target=_blank with rel="noopener noreferrer". REQ-17 cannot be fully verified from the provided truncated ContactPage diff; only the new icon imports are visible, not the actual “Connect With Us” icon row/links.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Contact page “Connect With Us” section to use TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook icons/links (replacing LinkedIn/YouTube) without changing any other Contact page copy, form fields, or layout structure.
missing_requirements.reason: The ContactPage.tsx diff is truncated before showing the “Connect With Us” section. The summary shows only the import of SiInstagram/SiTiktok/SiFacebook, but does not provide evidence that the icon row links were actually replaced/updated (or that no other contact content was changed beyond the social icons/links).
